concept.title: Using the Graph
concept.shortdesc: Execute commands using the "drag and drop" technique.

copyright.copyrholder: Use of this public-domain resource is governed by the Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 4.0 International License

conbody.p: The quickest and most intuitive way to manipulate the dataset is directly in the graph.
Almost all actions can be performed on the nodes either through a single click or a "drag and drop."
conbody.note: The exception is Label and Hide, which can only be performed in the Command Tab.
